title: "NBC Chicago Stations To Air News Series On Artificial Intelligence"
excerpt: "NBCUniversal’s television stations in Chicago, WMAQ-TV and Telemundo outlet WSNS-Tv, will be airing a news series on the benefits and concerns surrounding artificial intelligence. On WMAQ, the stories will run under the title You and AI. On Telemundo Chicago, the title is Tú y la IA."
